mapper.insert: insert into planocycle.priority_order_result_data(priority_order_cd,company_cd,restrict_cd,jan_cd,sku_rank, adopt_flag,face,face_sku,irisu,tai_cd,tana_cd,face_keisan,author_cd,editer_cd,create_time,edit_time) select priority_order_cd,company_cd,restrict_cd,jan_cd,sku_rank, adopt_flag,face,face_sku,irisu,tai_cd,tana_cd,face_keisan,author_cd,author_cd, now(), now() from planocycle.work_priority_order_result_data where company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and author_cd=#{authorCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and priority_order_cd = #{priorityOrderCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}
